product_doc:
### Hip Implant Set (IMPL-A21) ###
Supplier: SUP-001
Storage: Maintain 2–8°C (≈36–46°F). Record temperatures at handoff.
Escalation Policy (embedded): Zimmer Biotech | Escalation SOP (ZB-SUP-2041)
Tier 1 (<24h delay): logistics@zimmerbio.com
Tier 2 (temp >8°C or delay >24h): qa@zimmerbio.com; director.supply@zimmerbio.com
Tier 3 (critical): vp.ops@zimmerbio.com | +1-312-555-0100
SLA: Acknowledge 1h; CAPA 24h.

### Cardio Stent Kit (STENT-C13) ###
Supplier: SUP-002
Storage: Maintain 2–8°C (≈36–46°F). Record temperatures at handoff.
Escalation Policy (embedded): MedPro Devices | SLA (MP-SLA-007)
On-time ≥98%; zero tolerance outside 2–8°C
Escalation: shipping@medpro.com → operations@medpro.com → ceo.office@medpro.com
If weather delay >12h, reroute.

### Balloon Catheter (CATH-B08) ###
Supplier: SUP-003
Storage: Maintain 2–8°C (≈36–46°F). Record temperatures at handoff.
Escalation Policy (embedded): Ortho Dynamics | OD-QA-115
L1: warehouse.alerts@orthodynamics.com (≤2h)
L2: dist.ops@orthodynamics.com (≤4h)
L3: cmo.office@orthodynamics.com (≤8h)
Temp excursion → isolate lot; notify QA.

### Hernia Patch (PATCH-D02) ###
Supplier: SUP-004
Storage: Maintain 2–8°C (≈36–46°F). Record temperatures at handoff.
Escalation Policy (embedded): CardioNova | CN-COLD-003
Triggers: delay >24h, ambient >10°C, severe weather
Chain: supply@cardionova.com → qa@cardionova.com → compliance@cardionova.com

### Aortic Valve (VALVE-E11) ###
Supplier: SUP-005
Storage: Maintain 2–8°C (≈36–46°F). Record temperatures at handoff.
Escalation Policy (embedded): ValveX Labs | VX-QMS-221
Minor (<1°C) log; Moderate (1–3°C) notify QA; Critical (>3°C) isolate + escalate
Contacts: qa.supervisor@valvex.com; compliance@valvex.com
